Text.val: 12.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
21.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
Disabled buttons in toolbar in case of empty view

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OPH106K]: Times and sessions WS calls')
VarMod('{0,1}'VAR) OR VarMod('{0,2}'VAR) OR VarMod('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod('{0,4}'VAR)

Text.val: -- BWST_MODE is mandatory, allowed values I/O
-- Webservice time already defined for input or putput mode
-- Session must be unique within the same mode (I/O) range
(ING PL does not allow the same session number multiple times per day)
... in modifiy mode and time is changed prepare where clause
to prevent selection of BWST with previous time
